title: Not Your Usual Bollocks
content:
I found a podcast I can actually recommend: _[Not Your Usual Bollocks](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504205025/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewAlbum?playlistId=73799641&selectedItemId=73799641)_ (iTunes link requires v4.9 for built-in Podcast action) (or [NYUB.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504205025/http:/notyourusualbollocks.squarespace.com/)). It’s a very tasty 30 to 45 minute block of various indie tracks with very little jabber from the London-based host. He plays some obscure stuff (at least to my ears) - some Brit electronica, German electronic. Then he mixes in just enough recognizable stuff from Kasabian, Autolux, Aphex Twin and others to keep it at least a tad familiar. The unpretentious deejay doesn’t even mention his name.

Very highly recommended!

PS - make sure force yourself past the first 6 or 8 seconds of ironically dished 80s pop.
author: Joe Pemberton
